alert.note: Alert for Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:48AM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Sunflower River At Sunflower affecting Sunflower County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sunflower River at Sunflower. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Farm roads to catfish ponds become inundated. Jeffcoat road west of river gage floods * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Friday the stage was 21.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.0 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Big Sunflower River Sunflower 21.0 21.2 Fri 9 am CST 22.9 23.6 23.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 1000 PM CST.
